metadata.title: CVE-2020-6095 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the GstRTSPAuthfunctionality of GStreamer/gst-rtsp-server 1.14.5. A specially crafted RTSPsetup request can cause a null pointer deference resulting indenial-of-service. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gst-rtsp-server1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
